title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Northern Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Ronny Ansaldi, “First day of spring spent in these amazing green fields in northern Italy.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here. *Please note that […]

author: Kristi Benedict
